uvi.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.136
uvi.description:
usb: max-3421: Prevent corruption of freed memory

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.136 by commit 863d071dbcd54dacf47192a1365faec46b7a68ca, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 2d53139f31626bad6f8983d8e519ddde2cbba921. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: max-3421: Prevent corruption of freed memory
OSV.details:
